name: Ctop.inter_sub
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
σ : Type u_2
self : Ctop α σ
a b : σ
x : α
h : Membership.mem (Inter.inter (self.f a) (self.f b)) x
⊢ HasSubset.Subset (self.f (self.inter a b x h)) (Inter.inter (self.f a) (self.f b))
decl:
/-- A `Ctop α σ` is a realization of a topology (basis) on `α`,
  represented by a type `σ` together with operations for the top element and
  the intersection operation. -/
structure Ctop (α σ : Type*) where
  f : σ → Set α
  top : α → σ
  top_mem : ∀ x : α, x ∈ f (top x)
  inter : ∀ (a b) (x : α), x ∈ f a ∩ f b → σ
  inter_mem : ∀ a b x h, x ∈ f (inter a b x h)
  inter_sub : ∀ a b x h, f (inter a b x h) ⊆ f a ∩ f b

structure Ctop (α σ : Type*) where

decl:

name: Ctop.mk.inj

inter : (a b : σ) → (x : α) → Membership.mem (Inter.inter (f a) (f b)) x → σ

  inter : ∀ (a b) (x : α), x ∈ f a ∩ f b → σ

name: Ctop.mk.sizeOf_spec
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
σ : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : SizeOf α
inst✝ : SizeOf σ
f : σ → Set α
top : α → σ
top_mem : ∀ (x : α), Membership.mem (f (top x)) x
inter : (a b : σ) → (x : α) → Membership.mem (Inter.inter (f a) (f b)) x → σ
inter_mem : ∀ (a b : σ) (x : α) (h : Membership.mem (Inter.inter (f a) (f b)) x), Membership.mem (f (inter a b x h)) x
inter_sub : ∀ (a b : σ) (x : α) (h : Membership.mem (Inter.inter (f a) (f b)) x), HasSubset.Subset (f (inter a b x h)) (Inter.inter (f a) (f b))
⊢ Eq (SizeOf.sizeOf { f := f, top := top, top_mem := top_mem, inter := inter, inter_mem := inter_mem, inter_sub := inter_sub }) 1
decl:
/-- A `Ctop α σ` is a realization of a topology (basis) on `α`,

structure Ctop (α σ : Type*) where

  inter : ∀ (a b) (x : α), x ∈ f a ∩ f b → σ

  inter_sub : ∀ a b x h, f (inter a b x h) ⊆ f a ∩ f b

name: Ctop.coe_mk
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
σ : Type u_3
f : σ → Set α
T : α → σ
h₁ : ∀ (x : α), Membership.mem (f (T x)) x
I : (a b : σ) → (x : α) → Membership.mem (Inter.inter (f a) (f b)) x → σ
h₂ : ∀ (a b : σ) (x : α) (h : Membership.mem (Inter.inter (f a) (f b)) x), Membership.mem (f (I a b x h)) x
h₃ : ∀ (a b : σ) (x : α) (h : Membership.mem (Inter.inter (f a) (f b)) x), HasSubset.Subset (f (I a b x h)) (Inter.inter (f a) (f b))
a : σ
⊢ Eq ({ f := f, top := T, top_mem := h₁, inter := I, inter_mem := h₂, inter_sub := h₃ }.f a) (f a)
decl: theorem coe_mk (f T h₁ I h₂ h₃ a) : (@Ctop.mk α σ f T h₁ I h₂ h₃) a = f a := rfl

name: Ctop.ofEquiv_val
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
σ : Type u_3
τ : Type u_4
E : Equiv σ τ
F : Ctop α σ
a : τ
⊢ Eq ((Ctop.ofEquiv E F).f a) (F.f (E.symm a))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem ofEquiv_val (E : σ ≃ τ) (F : Ctop α σ) (a : τ) : F.ofEquiv E a = F (E.symm a) := by
  cases F; rfl

name: Ctop.toTopsp_isTopologicalBasis
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
σ : Type u_3
F : Ctop α σ
⊢ TopologicalSpace.IsTopologicalBasis (Set.range F.f)
decl:
theorem toTopsp_isTopologicalBasis (F : Ctop α σ) :
    @TopologicalSpace.IsTopologicalBasis _ F.toTopsp (Set.range F.f) :=
  letI := F.toTopsp
  ⟨fun _u ⟨a, e₁⟩ _v ⟨b, e₂⟩ ↦
    e₁ ▸ e₂ ▸ fun x h ↦ ⟨_, ⟨_, rfl⟩, F.inter_mem a b x h, F.inter_sub a b x h⟩,
    eq_univ_iff_forall.2 fun x ↦ ⟨_, ⟨_, rfl⟩, F.top_mem x⟩, rfl⟩

name: Ctop.mem_nhds_toTopsp
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
σ : Type u_3
F : Ctop α σ
s : Set α
a : α
⊢ Iff (Membership.mem (nhds a) s) (Exists fun b => And (Membership.mem (F.f b) a) (HasSubset.Subset (F.f b) s))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem mem_nhds_toTopsp (F : Ctop α σ) {s : Set α} {a : α} :
    s ∈ @nhds _ F.toTopsp a ↔ ∃ b, a ∈ F b ∧ F b ⊆ s :=
  (@TopologicalSpace.IsTopologicalBasis.mem_nhds_iff _ F.toTopsp _ _ _
        F.toTopsp_isTopologicalBasis).trans <|
    ⟨fun ⟨_, ⟨x, rfl⟩, h⟩ ↦ ⟨x, h⟩, fun ⟨x, h⟩ ↦ ⟨_, ⟨x, rfl⟩, h⟩⟩

name: Ctop.Realizer.eq
initialProofState:
α : Type u_6
T : TopologicalSpace α
self : Ctop.Realizer α
⊢ Eq self.F.toTopsp T
decl:
/-- A `Ctop` realizer for the topological space `T` is a `Ctop`
  which generates `T`. -/
structure Ctop.Realizer (α) [T : TopologicalSpace α] where
  σ : Type*
  F : Ctop α σ
  eq : F.toTopsp = T

name: Ctop.Realizer.mk.inj
initialProofState:
α : Type u_6
T : TopologicalSpace α
σ✝ : Type u_5
F✝ : Ctop α σ✝
eq✝ : Eq F✝.toTopsp T
σ : Type u_5
F : Ctop α σ
eq : Eq F.toTopsp T
x✝ : Eq { σ := σ✝, F := F✝, eq := eq✝ } { σ := σ, F := F, eq := eq }
⊢ And (Eq σ✝ σ) (HEq F✝ F)
decl:
/-- A `Ctop` realizer for the topological space `T` is a `Ctop`
  which generates `T`. -/
structure Ctop.Realizer (α) [T : TopologicalSpace α] where
  σ : Type*
  F : Ctop α σ
  eq : F.toTopsp = T

name: Ctop.Realizer.mk.injEq
initialProofState:
α : Type u_6
T : TopologicalSpace α
σ✝ : Type u_5
F✝ : Ctop α σ✝
eq✝ : Eq F✝.toTopsp T
σ : Type u_5
F : Ctop α σ
eq : Eq F.toTopsp T
⊢ Eq (Eq { σ := σ✝, F := F✝, eq := eq✝ } { σ := σ, F := F, eq := eq }) (And (Eq σ✝ σ) (HEq F✝ F))
decl:
/-- A `Ctop` realizer for the topological space `T` is a `Ctop`
  which generates `T`. -/
structure Ctop.Realizer (α) [T : TopologicalSpace α] where

name: Ctop.Realizer.mk.sizeOf_spec
initialProofState:
α : Type u_6
T : TopologicalSpace α
inst✝ : SizeOf α
σ : Type u_5
F : Ctop α σ
eq : Eq F.toTopsp T
⊢ Eq (SizeOf.sizeOf { σ := σ, F := F, eq := eq }) (HAdd.hAdd (HAdd.hAdd (HAdd.hAdd 1 (SizeOf.sizeOf σ)) (SizeOf.sizeOf F)) (SizeOf.sizeOf eq))
decl:
/-- A `Ctop` realizer for the topological space `T` is a `Ctop`

structure Ctop.Realizer (α) [T : TopologicalSpace α] where

name: Ctop.Realizer.is_basis
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
T : TopologicalSpace α
F : Ctop.Realizer α
⊢ TopologicalSpace.IsTopologicalBasis (Set.range F.F.f)
decl:
protected theorem is_basis [T : TopologicalSpace α] (F : Realizer α) :
    TopologicalSpace.IsTopologicalBasis (Set.range F.F.f) := by
  have := toTopsp_isTopologicalBasis F.F; rwa [F.eq] at this

name: Ctop.Realizer.mem_nhds
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
T : TopologicalSpace α
F : Ctop.Realizer α
s : Set α
a : α
⊢ Iff (Membership.mem (nhds a) s) (Exists fun b => And (Membership.mem (F.F.f b) a) (HasSubset.Subset (F.F.f b) s))
decl:
protected theorem mem_nhds [T : TopologicalSpace α] (F : Realizer α) {s : Set α} {a : α} :
    s ∈ 𝓝 a ↔ ∃ b, a ∈ F.F b ∧ F.F b ⊆ s := by
  have := @mem_nhds_toTopsp _ _ F.F s a; rwa [F.eq] at this

name: Ctop.Realizer.isOpen_iff
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : TopologicalSpace α
F : Ctop.Realizer α
s : Set α
⊢ Iff (IsOpen s) (∀ (a : α), Membership.mem s a → Exists fun b => And (Membership.mem (F.F.f b) a) (HasSubset.Subset (F.F.f b) s))
decl:
theorem isOpen_iff [TopologicalSpace α] (F : Realizer α) {s : Set α} :
    IsOpen s ↔ ∀ a ∈ s, ∃ b, a ∈ F.F b ∧ F.F b ⊆ s :=
  isOpen_iff_mem_nhds.trans <| forall₂_congr fun _a _h ↦ F.mem_nhds

name: Ctop.Realizer.isClosed_iff
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : TopologicalSpace α
F : Ctop.Realizer α
s : Set α
⊢ Iff (IsClosed s) (∀ (a : α), (∀ (b : F.σ), Membership.mem (F.F.f b) a → Exists fun z => Membership.mem (Inter.inter (F.F.f b) s) z) → Membership.mem s a)
decl:
theorem isClosed_iff [TopologicalSpace α] (F : Realizer α) {s : Set α} :
    IsClosed s ↔ ∀ a, (∀ b, a ∈ F.F b → ∃ z, z ∈ F.F b ∩ s) → a ∈ s :=
  isOpen_compl_iff.symm.trans <|
    F.isOpen_iff.trans <|
      forall_congr' fun a ↦
        show (a ∉ s → ∃ b : F.σ, a ∈ F.F b ∧ ∀ z ∈ F.F b, z ∉ s) ↔ _ by
          haveI := Classical.propDecidable; rw [not_imp_comm]
          simp [not_exists, not_and, not_forall, and_comm]

name: Ctop.Realizer.mem_interior_iff
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : TopologicalSpace α
F : Ctop.Realizer α
s : Set α
a : α
⊢ Iff (Membership.mem (interior s) a) (Exists fun b => And (Membership.mem (F.F.f b) a) (HasSubset.Subset (F.F.f b) s))
decl:
theorem mem_interior_iff [TopologicalSpace α] (F : Realizer α) {s : Set α} {a : α} :
    a ∈ interior s ↔ ∃ b, a ∈ F.F b ∧ F.F b ⊆ s :=
  mem_interior_iff_mem_nhds.trans F.mem_nhds

name: Ctop.Realizer.isOpen
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : TopologicalSpace α
F : Ctop.Realizer α
s : F.σ
⊢ IsOpen (F.F.f s)
decl:
protected theorem isOpen [TopologicalSpace α] (F : Realizer α) (s : F.σ) : IsOpen (F.F s) :=
  isOpen_iff_nhds.2 fun a m ↦ by simpa using F.mem_nhds.2 ⟨s, m, Subset.refl _⟩

name: Ctop.Realizer.ext'
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
T : TopologicalSpace α
σ : Type u_5
F : Ctop α σ
H : ∀ (a : α) (s : Set α), Iff (Membership.mem (nhds a) s) (Exists fun b => And (Membership.mem (F.f b) a) (HasSubset.Subset (F.f b) s))
⊢ Eq F.toTopsp T
decl:
theorem ext' [T : TopologicalSpace α] {σ : Type*} {F : Ctop α σ}
    (H : ∀ a s, s ∈ 𝓝 a ↔ ∃ b, a ∈ F b ∧ F b ⊆ s) : F.toTopsp = T := by
  refine TopologicalSpace.ext_nhds fun x ↦ ?_
  ext s
  rw [mem_nhds_toTopsp, H]

name: Ctop.Realizer.ext
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
T : TopologicalSpace α
σ : Type u_5
F : Ctop α σ
H₁ : ∀ (a : σ), IsOpen (F.f a)
H₂ : ∀ (a : α) (s : Set α), Membership.mem (nhds a) s → Exists fun b => And (Membership.mem (F.f b) a) (HasSubset.Subset (F.f b) s)
⊢ Eq F.toTopsp T
decl:
theorem ext [T : TopologicalSpace α] {σ : Type*} {F : Ctop α σ} (H₁ : ∀ a, IsOpen (F a))
    (H₂ : ∀ a s, s ∈ 𝓝 a → ∃ b, a ∈ F b ∧ F b ⊆ s) : F.toTopsp = T :=
  ext' fun a s ↦ ⟨H₂ a s, fun ⟨_b, h₁, h₂⟩ ↦ mem_nhds_iff.2 ⟨_, h₂, H₁ _, h₁⟩⟩

name: Ctop.Realizer.ofEquiv_σ
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
τ : Type u_4
inst✝ : TopologicalSpace α
F : Ctop.Realizer α
E : Equiv F.σ τ
⊢ Eq (F.ofEquiv E).σ τ
decl:
@[simp]
theorem ofEquiv_σ (F : Realizer α) (E : F.σ ≃ τ) : (F.ofEquiv E).σ = τ := rfl

name: Ctop.Realizer.ofEquiv_F
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
τ : Type u_4
inst✝ : TopologicalSpace α
F : Ctop.Realizer α
E : Equiv F.σ τ
s : τ
⊢ Eq ((F.ofEquiv E).F.f s) (F.F.f (E.symm s))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem ofEquiv_F (F : Realizer α) (E : F.σ ≃ τ) (s : τ) : (F.ofEquiv E).F s = F.F (E.symm s) := by
  delta ofEquiv; simp

name: Ctop.Realizer.nhds_σ
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : TopologicalSpace α
F : Ctop.Realizer α
a : α
⊢ Eq (F.nhds a).σ (Subtype fun s => Membership.mem (F.F.f s) a)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem nhds_σ (F : Realizer α) (a : α) : (F.nhds a).σ = { s : F.σ // a ∈ F.F s } := rfl

name: Ctop.Realizer.nhds_F
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : TopologicalSpace α
F : Ctop.Realizer α
a : α
s : (F.nhds a).σ
⊢ Eq ((F.nhds a).F.f s) (F.F.f ↑s)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem nhds_F (F : Realizer α) (a : α) (s) : (F.nhds a).F s = F.F s.1 := rfl

name: Ctop.Realizer.tendsto_nhds_iff
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝ : TopologicalSpace α
m : β → α
f : Filter β
F : f.Realizer
R : Ctop.Realizer α
a : α
⊢ Iff (Filter.Tendsto m f (nhds a)) (∀ (t : R.σ), Membership.mem (R.F.f t) a → Exists fun s => ∀ (x : β), Membership.mem (F.F.f s) x → Membership.mem (R.F.f t) (m x))
decl:
theorem tendsto_nhds_iff {m : β → α} {f : Filter β} (F : f.Realizer) (R : Realizer α) {a : α} :
    Tendsto m f (𝓝 a) ↔ ∀ t, a ∈ R.F t → ∃ s, ∀ x ∈ F.F s, m x ∈ R.F t :=
  (F.tendsto_iff _ (R.nhds a)).trans Subtype.forall

name: LocallyFinite.Realizer.mk.sizeOf_spec
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝³ : TopologicalSpace α
F : Ctop.Realizer α
f : β → Set α
inst✝² : SizeOf α
inst✝¹ : SizeOf β
inst✝ : (a : β) → (a_1 : α) → SizeOf (f a a_1)
bas : (a : α) → Subtype fun s => Membership.mem (F.F.f s) a
sets : (x : α) → Fintype ↑(setOf fun i => (Inter.inter (f i) (F.F.f ↑(bas x))).Nonempty)
⊢ Eq (SizeOf.sizeOf { bas := bas, sets := sets }) 1

name: LocallyFinite.Realizer.mk.injEq
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝ : TopologicalSpace α
F : Ctop.Realizer α
f : β → Set α
bas✝ : (a : α) → Subtype fun s => Membership.mem (F.F.f s) a
sets✝ : (x : α) → Fintype ↑(setOf fun i => (Inter.inter (f i) (F.F.f ↑(bas✝ x))).Nonempty)
bas : (a : α) → Subtype fun s => Membership.mem (F.F.f s) a
sets : (x : α) → Fintype ↑(setOf fun i => (Inter.inter (f i) (F.F.f ↑(bas x))).Nonempty)
⊢ Eq (Eq { bas := bas✝, sets := sets✝ } { bas := bas, sets := sets }) (And (Eq bas✝ bas) (HEq sets✝ sets))

name: LocallyFinite.Realizer.mk.inj
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝ : TopologicalSpace α
F : Ctop.Realizer α
f : β → Set α
bas✝ : (a : α) → Subtype fun s => Membership.mem (F.F.f s) a
sets✝ : (x : α) → Fintype ↑(setOf fun i => (Inter.inter (f i) (F.F.f ↑(bas✝ x))).Nonempty)
bas : (a : α) → Subtype fun s => Membership.mem (F.F.f s) a
sets : (x : α) → Fintype ↑(setOf fun i => (Inter.inter (f i) (F.F.f ↑(bas x))).Nonempty)
x✝ : Eq { bas := bas✝, sets := sets✝ } { bas := bas, sets := sets }
⊢ And (Eq bas✝ bas) (HEq sets✝ sets)

name: LocallyFinite.Realizer.to_locallyFinite
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝ : TopologicalSpace α
F : Ctop.Realizer α
f : β → Set α
R : LocallyFinite.Realizer F f
⊢ LocallyFinite f

name: locallyFinite_iff_exists_realizer
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝ : TopologicalSpace α
F : Ctop.Realizer α
f : β → Set α
⊢ Iff (LocallyFinite f) (Nonempty (LocallyFinite.Realizer F f))
decl:
theorem locallyFinite_iff_exists_realizer [TopologicalSpace α] (F : Ctop.Realizer α)
    {f : β → Set α} : LocallyFinite f ↔ Nonempty (LocallyFinite.Realizer F f) :=
  ⟨fun h ↦
    let ⟨g, h₁⟩ := Classical.axiom_of_choice h
    let ⟨g₂, h₂⟩ :=
      Classical.axiom_of_choice fun x ↦
        show ∃ b : F.σ, x ∈ F.F b ∧ F.F b ⊆ g x from
          let ⟨h, _h'⟩ := h₁ x
          F.mem_nhds.1 h
    ⟨⟨fun x ↦ ⟨g₂ x, (h₂ x).1⟩, fun x ↦
        Finite.fintype <|
          let ⟨_h, h'⟩ := h₁ x
          h'.subset fun _i hi ↦ hi.mono (inter_subset_inter_right _ (h₂ x).2)⟩⟩,
    fun ⟨R⟩ ↦ R.to_locallyFinite⟩

name: instNonemptyRealizerOfFinite
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : TopologicalSpace α
inst✝ : Finite β
F : Ctop.Realizer α
f : β → Set α
⊢ Nonempty (LocallyFinite.Realizer F f)
decl:
instance [TopologicalSpace α] [Finite β] (F : Ctop.Realizer α) (f : β → Set α) :
    Nonempty (LocallyFinite.Realizer F f) :=
  (locallyFinite_iff_exists_realizer _).1 <| locallyFinite_of_finite _
